name: rimworld-workshop-downloader-backend
description: Backend Node.js dla Rimworld Workshop Downloader

scripts.build:sidecar: npm run build && npm run build:bundle && pkg dist/bundle.js --targets node22-linux-x64 --output bin/rimworld-workshop-downloader-backend-x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu && pkg dist/bundle.js --targets node22-win-x64 --output bin/rimworld-workshop-downloader-backend-x86_64-pc-windows-msvc.exe && pkg dist/bundle.js --targets node22-macos-x64 --output bin/rimworld-workshop-downloader-backend-x86_64-apple-darwin
